job1.title: Senior Flutter Developer
job1.description: We are seeking a talented Senior Flutter Developer to join our innovative mobile development team.
requirements: 5+ years of mobile app development experience
Expert knowledge of Flutter and Dart
Strong understanding of state management patterns
Experience with Firebase and cloud services

qualifications.education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

job2.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job2.description: Looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to develop AI solutions
requirements: Master's or PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science or related field
Strong experience with Python and ML frameworks
Knowledge of deep learning and neural networks

qualifications.education: Master's degree in Computer Science or related field

job3.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
job3.description: Seeking a creative UI/UX Designer to craft exceptional user experiences
requirements: Expert in Figma and design tools
Strong portfolio of web and mobile designs
Experience with user research and testing

qualifications.education: Bachelor's degree in Design or related field
